an3.43:4.1: “Mendicants, taking three reasons into consideration provides quite enough motivation to teach Dharma to another.
an3.43:4.3: When the teacher understands the meaning and the teaching.
an3.43:4.4: When the audience understands the meaning and the teaching.
an3.43:4.5: When both the teacher and the audience understand the meaning and the teaching.
an3.43:4.6: Taking these three reasons into consideration provides quite enough motivation to teach Dharma to another.”
